## Feature Summary

A brief description of the feature you'd like to see added.

## Problem/Use Case

What problem does this feature solve? What use case does it address?

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you think this feature should work. Include:

- API endpoint changes (if applicable)
- New parameters or response formats
- Example usage

## Alternative Solutions

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or examples that might help understand the feature request.

## Implementation Notes

If you have thoughts on how this could be implemented, share them here (optional).
